comments.body: change V1Table to V2Table here, because to lookup V1 table, the catalog will return `UnresolvedCatalogRelation` first and it needs `FindDataSourceTable` rule to resolve. But, `FindDataSourceTable` is in sql/core while the test is in sql/catalyst. So we need to use V2Table instead to avoid depending on `FindDataSourceTable`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +54,58 @@          catalogTable.schema,
          Array.empty,
          Map.empty[String, String].asJava)
      }
      override def name: String = CatalogManager.SESSION_CATALOG_NAME
